name: Doximity
description: Doximity connects physicians to make them more successful and productive. With over 40% of U.S. physicians as members, collaborating across every specialty and academic medical center, Doximity is the largest HIPAA-secure medical network in the country. In a system increasingly run by executives, Doximity takes care of the people that take care of us.
